fulltext:
NGUYỄN NGỌC TRÀ MY
Lawyer
PERSONAL PROFILE
I am an trustworthy lawyer  who is looking for a full-
time job in order to enhance my skills and gain more
experience and knowledge by contributing to the
company's success and reputation. 
CONTACT DETAILS
EXPERIENCES
Volunteer
I stayed with international volunteers in Manila
(Philippines) to serve/to organize different
programs/activities for the local people
like the poor, the sicked children, the young people,
etc. Through this, I learnt to work in team and in
cultural differences, also earned the experience of
adaptability as well as many other skills like project
management, time management, public speaking,
etc.
ESM Manila | Sep 2018 - May 2019
Lawyer
I was in charge of providing legal advice on 
 corporate governance, investment, labour, dispute
resolution, litigation and other advise work for both
domestic and international clients to make sure that
the clients' request is satisfied as much as possible
according to the law of Vietnam. In accordance with
the advice, I assist the Clients in preparing, drafting ,
reviewing necessary documents as well as
implementing required legal procedures. Our clients
are in different fields like: logistics, trading,
pharmaceutical products, etc.
TA Legal Limited Liability Law Company|
Feb 2016 - Aug 2019
Legal Consultant
I was assigned to advise and assist the clients on
business registration, investment registration as well
as initial tax registration, labour registration, social
insurance registration, labour regulation,
immigration issues, civil transactions such as rental
contract, property transfer contract and other advise
work. 
Tam & Associate Limited Liability Law
CompanyI Sep 2011 - Jan 2016
Mobile: +84 0938712434
Email: nntmy116@gmail.com
SKILLS AND ABILITIES
- Legal contract/document drafting
- Listening person
- Negotiation skill
- Diligent learner
- Organized person
- Team player
- Hard working
- Motivated and dedicated
ACADEMIC PROFILE
University of Economic and Law
Studying Master of Economic Law, 2013-2015
Ho Chi Minh City University of Law
Bachelor of Law, 2007 - 2011
OTHER SKILLS
I am able to communicate well in English due to
nearly one year of living abroad. Being attentive and
caring is also my strength at working environment.
PROFESSIONAL ACCOMPLISHMENTS
- Member of the Bar Association of Ho Chi Minh City.
Lawyer Card No.11121/LS issued by the Vietnam Bar
Federationon 28/7/2016;
- Lawyers’ Practicing Certificate No.2483/TP/LS-CCHN
issued by the Ministry of Justice on 19/02/2016;
- Successfully completed the course on "Dispute
resolution system: policies, structures ad strategies"
organized by Vietnam-Singapore Training Center,
sponsored by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs,
Singapore in collaboration with the Ministry of
Foreign Affairs, Vietnam.
NOTABLE CASES
- DB Group Vietnam - on the agreement of capital
contribution of company's member; company charter
review;  adjustment of its investment project;
- Ginza Matsunaga Co., Ltd - on its establishment in
Vietnam, its corporate governance and its labour
issues;
- Bharat Serums and Vaccines Limited - on the
restructure as well as the extension of its Ref. Office
in Vietnam;
- Tai Tai Production & Trading Joint Stock Company -
on dispute with its distributor;
- Proton Co., Ltd - on its cooperation project of
investing and developing Dau Giay wholesales
market;
- Yumark (Vietnam) Co., Ltd - on foreigner labour
issues.
HONORS & AWARDS:
- Very good degree classification for graduation by
Ho Chi Minh City University of Law in 2011;
- Scholarship of English Language Program issued by
PETRONAS (2010);
- Scholarship for students who have outstanding
studying result by Lawrence S.ting Memorial Fund
(2010);
- Certificate of participation as a student volunteer in
the 4th LAWASIA International Moot - International
Rounds (2009).

experiences.detail: I stayed with international volunteers in Manila (Philippines) to serve/to organize different programs/activities for the local people like the poor, the sicked children, the young people, etc. Through this, I learnt to work in team and in cultural differences, also earned the experience of adaptability as well as many other skills like project management, time management, public speaking, etc.
